summary: Carrie White is a lonely and painfully shy teenage girl with telekinetic powers who is slowly pushed to the edge of insanity by frequent bullying from both her classmates and her domineering, religious mother.
cast: Angela Bettis|Patricia Clarkson|Rena Sofer|Kandyse McClure|Emilie de Ravin|Tobias Mehler|Jesse Cadotte|Meghan Black|Chelan Simmons|Katharine Isabelle|David Keith|Miles Meadows|Sean Tyler Foley|Laurie Murdoch|Michael Kopsa|Michaela Mann|Jodelle Ferland|Deborah DeMille|Malcolm Scott|Steve Byers|Erin Karpluk|Bill Dow|Andrew Robb|David Neale|Cascy Beddow|Irene Miscisco|Ed Anders|Laura Boddington|Paul Dzenkiw|Michael J. Tomaso|Savannah Walker|Nicole Watson
title: Carrie
